title: Perplexity Launches BrowseSafe to Secure the Next Era of Agentic Web Browsing
description: Perplexity introduces BrowseSafe, a real-time content detection model & open benchmark, securing AI browser agents from prompt-injection attacks. Protects users!
content:
Credit: Perplexity
Perplexity has unveiled BrowseSafe, a real-time content detection model and open research benchmark designed to protect AI browser agents from prompt-injection attacks. As AI assi… [+1678 chars]
